In England, in the seven days to 05 May, there were 12,050 new confirmed cases (21.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 28 April, there were 13,159 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 8% (1,109 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 10 May is 3,876,424 (6,886.9 cases per 100,000 population).
